main event: Three F-105 pilots and one C-124 pilot reported an unidentified flying object while on a flight near Iheima and Neyaro Bay Tarutama Shima.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by pilots from different aircraft,The pilots were able to maintain visual contact with the object,The sighting occurred 15 miles from their escorting aircraft,The time of the sighting was noted as 4 November 1965 at 23Z,The report indicates the object was observed at a significant altitude.
witness description: F-105 pilots and one C-124 pilot
